headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For Trimble Today
summary: Trimble’s latest narrative update leaves fair value largely unchanged at about $98.45 per share, even as subtle shifts in key assumptions reshape the risk and growth profile behind that target. A slightly higher discount rate, alongside modestly lower revenue growth, reflects caution around macro and execution risks, while steady confidence in the long term shift to software and recurring revenue continues to anchor the valuation case. Read on to see how these moving parts fit together and...
